name: Treasure Raiders
overview: Deep in the tomb of King Batutu is buried a treasure, untouched for centuries. Many have tried to find their way through the deep and dark corridors. No one has succeeded. Can you solve the maze? Each time the program starts, a new maze is drawn. You have ten seconds to view it before you start your trek. A timer starts when you begin. If you don't get through the maze in time, you'll starve, so be efficient in your moves. A help key will give you another quick look at the maze if you are stuck. Press H. Released as part of "Commodore Pro-Pak" game pack.
